```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(arules)
library(datasets)
data("Groceries")
```


```{r}
#Step 2: look at data
itemFrequencyPlot(Groceries, topN=10, type = "absolute")
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#Step 3: Run MB Analysis

#set minimum support to 0.001
#set minimum confidence to 0.8

rules <- apriori(Groceries, parameter = list(supp=0.001,
                                             conf=0.9))

options(digits = 2)
inspect(rules[1:10])
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#STEP 4: Sort rules

rules <- sort(rules, decreasing = TRUE, by="confidence")
inspect(rules[1:5])
```


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#STEP 5: Plot rules
library(arulesViz)
plot(rules[1:5], method="graph",shading = NA)
```
